display_help: Warms an ally and frees them from any Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Confuse, Fear, Slow and Immobilize effects and leaves them resistant to such effects for a good while. Thaw also grants the target some resistance to Cold damage. Some of the effects of this power will improve with multiple applications and as you advance in level. Recharge: Fast
display_short_help: Ally +Res(Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Immobilize, Confuse, Fear, Cold, Slow)
display_target_help: You have been Thawed. You now have temporary resistance to Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Immobilize, Confuse, Fear and slow effects and your resistance to Cold is improved.
display_target_short_help: +Res(Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Immobilize, Confuse, Fear, Cold, Slow)
display_attacker_hit: You protect {PlayerDest} from Cold, Slow, Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Confuse, Fear, and Immobilize effects with your {PowerName} power.
display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} protects you from Cold, Slow, Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Confuse, Fear, and Immobilize effects.
